TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AcquireTokenForClientParameterBuilder extends Microsoft.Identity.Client.ApiConfig.AbstractConfidentialClientAcquireTokenParameterBuilder`1<class Microsoft.Identity.Client.ApiConfig.AcquireTokenForClientParameterBuilder>
Public NotInheritable Class AcquireTokenForClientParameterBuilder Inherits AbstractConfidentialClientAcquireTokenParameterBuilder(Of AcquireTokenForClientParameterBuilder)

Docs.summary: Builder for AcquireTokenForClient (used in client credential flows, in daemon applications).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Identity.Client.ApiConfig.AcquireTokenForClientParameterBuilder WithForceRefresh(bool forceRefresh) cil managed
Public Function WithForceRefresh (forceRefresh As Boolean) As AcquireTokenForClientParameterBuilder

Docs.param: If true, the request will ignore the token cache. The default is false
Docs.summary: Specifies if the token request will ignore the access token in the application token cache and will attempt to acquire a new access token using client credentials. By default the token is taken from the application token cache (forceRefresh=false)
Docs.returns: The builder to chain the .With methods

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Identity.Client.ApiConfig.AcquireTokenForClientParameterBuilder WithSendX5C(bool withSendX5C) cil managed
Public Function WithSendX5C (withSendX5C As Boolean) As AcquireTokenForClientParameterBuilder

Docs.param: true if the x5c should be sent. Otherwise false. The default is false
Docs.summary: Specifies if the x5c claim (public key of the certificate) should be sent to the STS. Sending the x5x enables application developers to achieve easy certificate roll-over in Azure AD: this method will send the public certificate to Azure AD along with the token request, so that Azure AD can use it to validate the subject name based on a trusted issuer policy. This saves the application admin from the need to explicitly manage the certificate rollover (either via portal or powershell/CLI operation)
Docs.returns: The builder to chain the .With methods
